
#include<iostream>

int main()
{
	int T;
	std::cin >> T;
	int nArrival[1001];
	while(T--)
	{
		int nGuests[1001] = {0};
		int N;
		std::cin >> N;

		int i = 0;
		while(i < N)
		{
			std::cin >> nArrival[i];
			i++;
		}
		i = 0;
		while(i < N)
		{
			int nValue;
			std::cin >> nValue;
			for(int k = nArrival[i]; k < nValue; k++)
			{
				nGuests[k]++;
			}
			i++;
		}
		int nMaxIndex = 1;
		i = 2;
		while(i < 1001)
		{
			if(nGuests[i] > nGuests[nMaxIndex])
			{
				nMaxIndex = i;
			}
			i++;
		}
		std::cout << nGuests[nMaxIndex] << std::endl;

	}
	return 0;
}
